title: AMD denies report of MI455X delays as Nvidia VR200 systems are rumored to arrive early company says Helios systems 'on target for 2H 2026'
summary: AMD denies MI455X delays, but potential 2027 release. Nvidia's VR200 may arrive early, impacting market share.
insight: AMD's AI market prospects may be threatened by potential delay.

title: High-end Android phones are now powerful enough to emulate the PC version of Cyberpunk 2077 YouTuber gets 2020's hottest PC game running at playable frame rates on Red Magic 11 Pro
summary: High-end Android phones can now emulate the PC version of Cyberpunk 2077 with playable frame rates, thanks to x86 emulation. This achievement was made possible by YouTuber ETA Prime using the Red Magic 11 Pro smartphone. The result showcases the significant progress in mobile gaming capabilities.
insight: High-end smartphones bridge the gap between PC and gaming performance.

title: New report shows RAM prices are continuing to fall in Germany, US trends less certain SSDs and HDDs are more expensive than ever in the States
summary: RAM prices in Germany have stabilized with some price cuts, but remain 300% higher than five months ago. HDDs and SSDs, however, have become more expensive in the US. This trend is less certain in the US compared to Germany.
insight: Germany's RAM pricing trend is more stable than the US market.

title: OpenAI hires 'genius' OpenClaw creator, but popular AI assistant will remain open source Sam Altman says creator will work on 'smart agents' in new role
summary: OpenAI hires OpenClaw creator, keeping the project open source. The creator will work on 'smart agents'.
insight: AI development collaboration drives innovation and open-source advancements.

title: Brace for a barren landscape of new hardware launches, as AI demand reshapes the world of consumer electronics trillions in AI investment threaten to derail entire industries
summary: The DRAM supply squeeze and AI demand reshape consumer electronics landscape, threatening entire industries with massive scale and investment.
insight: AI-driven growth disrupts traditional industries with unprecedented scale and investment.

title: NZXT unveils new H2 mini PC with 9800X3D, Intel 285K configurations H2 Flow Mini-ITX case and C850 SFX power supply for builders
summary: NZXT introduces the H2 Mini PC with customizable configurations, paired with the H2 Flow Mini-ITX case and C850 SFX power supply, catering to compact PC builders.
insight: Compact PC builders now have a highly customizable, powerful option available.

title: Dell XPS 14 (2026) review: Two steps forward
summary: The Dell XPS 14 (2026) offers an improved design and features. It boasts attractive aesthetics and a keyboard with a functional row, along with solid speakers and long battery life. However, the low-travel keyboard requires some adjustment.
insight: Design and feature upgrades outweigh keyboard drawbacks

title: Japanese toilet maker 'the most undervalued and overlooked AI memory beneficiary,' investors claim shares up nearly 40% in first two months of 2026
summary: Japanese toilet maker's stock has surged nearly 40% in two months due to high demand for advanced ceramics products.
insight: Undervalued AI memory beneficiary leads to unexpected stock market success.

title: This Corsair RAM and Gigabyte AM5 motherboard bundle is just $67 more than buying the RAM alone 32GB of RAM and B850 Aorus Elite Wifi 7 shaves $133 off buying separately
summary: The Gigabyte B850 Aorus Elite Wifi 7 + 32GB Corsair Vengeance RGB DDR5-6400 bundle is available at 20% off on Newegg for under $505, offering AMD AM5 support, Wi-Fi 7, and RGB lighting.
insight: Buying a bundle saves significantly compared to purchasing components separately.

title: Sony considering PlayStation 6 delay to 2029, while Nintendo could hike Switch 2 price, according to report memory and storage chip shortage now impacting products outside of RAM, storage, and GPUs
summary: Sony may delay the PlayStation 6, while Nintendo could raise Switch 2 prices, due to a memory and storage chip shortage affecting consumer electronics beyond PCs.
insight: Chip shortage impacts gaming and beyond with far-reaching industry consequences.

title: SATA SSD cheated death from failed attempt at data destruction with a drill drive emerges victorious in face-off against IT worker
summary: An IT employee attempted to destroy sensitive data by drilling a SATA SSD, but the drive survived. The SSD's internal mechanisms and design protected it from the physical damage. The incident highlights the fragility of human attempts to destroy data.
insight: Data destruction is a challenging and often futile endeavor.

title: Valve confirms Steam Deck is out of stock due to memory and storage shortages supply of popular gaming handheld in trouble because of massive AI demand
summary: Valve's Steam Deck is out of stock due to memory and chip shortages, affecting availability in several regions.
insight: Massive AI demand exacerbates chip shortages, impacting gaming handheld supplies.

title: Tech tinkerer gets Gemini to help him 'vibe code' an x86 motherboard design bot help was impressive, but project still required human awareness and intervention
summary: A tech tinkerer utilized Gemini's AI to aid in designing an x86 motherboard, leveraging its capabilities to enhance the design process. However, human intervention and awareness remained necessary throughout the project.
insight: AI-assisted design requires human oversight and creative problem-solving skills.

title: Engineer finds his smart sleep mask can read other people's brainwaves due to poor software security superpower granted via poor-quality software with hardcoded high-level credentials
summary: An engineer discovers his smart sleep mask can remotely read brainwaves, sparking concern over data privacy.
insight: Poor software security grants unintended superpower for remote brainwave access.

title: Turtle Beach's rotating button Stealth Pivot wireless controller falls to just $99.99 this hall effect gamepad hits its lowest ever price
summary: The Turtle Beach Stealth Pivot HE gamepad drops to $99.99, its lowest price ever. This wireless controller features rotating button modules for customization. It offers multi-controller versatility.
insight: Gaming innovation at an affordable price point

title: $50 junk second-hand motherboard turns into a SSD treasure trove worth $1,500 12 terabytes of blazing-fast storage finds a new owner amid crushing shortages
summary: A Redditor bought a damaged Z690 motherboard for $50, discovering up to $1,500 worth of SSDs hidden beneath the heatsinks, taking advantage of a storage shortage.
insight: Second-hand electronics can conceal hidden value in times of shortage.

title: Murena Volla 12.6-inch privacy-focused tablet runs /e/OS Google-free Android OS on MediaTek Helio G99 SoC
summary: The Murena Volla 12.6-inch tablet runs /e/OS on a MediaTek Helio G99 SoC, offering a Google-free Android experience with enhanced privacy features. It features 12GB of RAM, 512GB of storage, and a 13MP rear camera. This device is suitable for secure business, education, and family use.
insight: /e/OS provides a fully customizable, Google-free Android experience.

title: NXP S32N79 octa-core Arm Cortex-A78E/12-core Cortex-R52 Super-Integration Processor targets Software-Defined Vehicles (SDV)
summary: NXP's S32N79 processor is designed for software-defined vehicles, offering improved performance and features.
insight: Advanced features for Software-Defined Vehicles through AI-enabled ADAS capabilities.

title: Olimex ESP32-P4-PC board offers HDMI video output, Ethernet, four USB 2.0 ports, and more
summary: The Olimex ESP32-P4-PC board features a high-performance ESP32-P4 SoC, HDMI output, and multiple USB 2.0 ports, making it a feature-rich option for ESP32-P4 development. It supports various power sources, including USB Type-C, LiPo battery, and PoE. The board offers a 20-pin GPIO header for expansion and a UEXT connector.
insight: High-performance ESP32-P4 board boosts AI and IoT development

title: PiBot CNC Pendant V4.0 A handheld Bluetooth and RJ12 controller for FluidNC-based CNC machines
summary: PiBot CNC Pendant V4.0 is a handheld controller for FluidNC-based CNC machines. It features a capacitive touchscreen, industrial-grade encoder, and Bluetooth/RJ12 connectivity. The device allows manual control and monitoring of CNC routers and laser engravers.
insight: Handheld control enhances CNC machine usability and safety
